prompt: Your job is to rephrase text without changing its meaning.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of four cases of this food had an unpleasant sour smell. when i contacted natural balance's customer service, they told me they hadn't received complaints about that batch, but would pass along the information to their technical department. they offered a coupon for one case, citing variation as expected due to it being a natural product. however, they suggested returning the food to the retailer, which would require paying for shipping three times. i've been feeding this variety to my three cats for a year, alternating with natural balance ultra, and they only eat this batch when they're extremely hungry. all other batches had a clean, fresh smell. i'm disappointed in the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium-priced product. i won't be buying from natural balance again; instead, i'll use the coupon locally and ensure i mix production runs.

prompt: Your job is to rephrase text without changing its meaning.
input_text:

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.

prompt: Your job is to rephrase text without changing its meaning.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, all different breeds and sizes. i was looking for a dog food without additives that would benefit all my dogs. some need to lose weight. wellness makes the best product. i buy the small bites for my smaller dogs, which they love because the pieces are small. i also buy the healthy weight core for my dogs who need to diet, mixing it with canned green beans or peas and carrots. so far, my golden retriever, a rescue who was 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for about seven months. i buy the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had digestive issues. with wellness, there are no more unpleasant odors or ripples at night! amazon offers the best price for wellness and ships it directly to my home, eliminating the need to lug heavy bags around. while it's more expensive than other options, it really works, which will save on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats. the value is priceless! wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies. a family member's teddy bear, who had severe skin issues, would scratch until raw and bloody. after switching to the simple version of wellness, she has been itch-free ever since. again, it's a great brand!

Again...great brand!

prompt: Rephrase this text while maintaining its original sentiment.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, all different breeds and sizes. i was searching for a dog food without additives that would benefit my entire pack. some of my dogs need to lose weight. wellness makes the best product. i buy the small bites for my smaller dogs - they love the tiny pieces. i purchase the healthy weight core formula for my dieters, mixing it with canned green beans or peas and carrots. so far, my golden retriever, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for about seven months. i buy the original core version for my baby bulldog, who suffered from gas. no more odors and ripples in the night! amazon offers the best price for wellness, with convenient shipping right to my doorstep - no need to lug heavy bags around. yes, it's more expensive than other options, but it really works, which will cut down on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and have nice, shiny coats. priceless! wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies. a family member's little teddy bear had severe skin issues - she'd scratch until raw and bloody. she switched to the simple version of wellness and has been itch-free ever since. again, great brand!

prompt: Rewrite this passage keeping the tone and meaning the same.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off-smell. i called natural balance customer service, and they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, would pass info along to tech dept, and send me a coupon for 1 case. but, it's a natural product, and variation was to be expected. they suggested i return it to the retailer, paying for shipping three times for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive. i've fed this variety to my three cats for a year (alternating with natural balance ultra), and they have always loved it. they will only eat this batch if they are very hungry. i can barely stand to open the cans. all other batches had a clean, fresh smell. i'm disappointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium-priced product (i have three cats). i won't buy from natural balance again. i'll use the coupon locally and make sure i'm mixing production runs.

prompt: Rephrase this text while maintaining its original sentiment.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of four cases had a sour off-smell. after contacting natural balance's customer service, they informed me that no complaints about that batch had been received, but they would pass on the information to their tech department and send a coupon for one case. however, as it's a natural product, variation was expected. they suggested returning it to the retailer, which would involve paying for shipping three times - a costly endeavor for a heavy product like this. i've fed this variety to my three cats for a year, alternating with natural balance ultra, and they always loved it. however, this batch is so unpalatable that even my cats will only eat it when extremely hungry. all other batches had a clean, fresh smell. i'm disappointed in the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium-priced product. due to this experience, i won't be buying from natural balance again and plan to use the coupon locally, ensuring that i mix production runs going forward.

prompt: Rephrase this text while maintaining its original sentiment.
input_text:
I was expecting something more.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.
completion_text: i was anticipating more from this product. blueberries - tiny pieces and scarce in quantity. clusters - where did they go? the pictures make it seem like a bag full of large clusters, but that's not the case; there are almost none, with the largest i found being about the size of a dime. taste - good when you manage to get a mix of everything. i don't think i'll be buying this product again with all the other options out there.

prompt: Rephrase this text while maintaining its original sentiment.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, all different breeds and sizes. i searched for a brand without additives that would benefit them all. some need to lose weight. wellness makes the best product. i buy their small bites for my smaller ones - the pieces are small and they love it. for my dieters, i mix the healthy weight core with canned green beans or peas and carrots. my golden, an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after about seven months on this food. i also use the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had gas issues. no more smells and ripples at night! amazon offers the best price for wellness, which ships directly to my home - no need to lug big bags around. while it's more expensive than other brands, it really works and will save on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy with shiny coats, priceless! wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies. a family member's teddy bear had severe skin issues, scratching until raw and bloody. after switching to the simple wellness version, she's been itch-free ever since. again, great brand!

prompt: Rewrite this sentence to improve clarity but maintain its sentiment.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my latest purchase of four cases had a strong sour smell, which is unusual for natural balance products. despite my complaint to their customer service, they dismissed it as normal variation in a natural product. they offered a coupon for one case, suggesting i return the rest to the retailer at my own expense. as someone who has fed this variety to my three cats for over a year, i'm disappointed that the quality has changed and the company doesn't seem to care about loyal customers like me.

prompt: Rewrite this sentence to improve clarity but maintain its sentiment.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.
completion_text: i expected more from this product, but was disappointed by its small and few blueberries. the clusters i saw in pictures were nowhere to be found; instead, i got mostly tiny pieces, with the largest cluster being about the size of a dime. while the taste is good when you get a mix of everything, overall, i'm not impressed and won't be buying this again.

prompt: Rewrite this sentence to improve clarity but maintain its sentiment.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, various breeds and sizes, all requiring a healthy diet without additives. i searched for a brand that could benefit them all, including those needing weight loss. wellness stands out as producing the best product. for my smaller dogs, i buy the small bites, which they love due to their tiny pieces. for my dieters, i mix healthy weight core with canned vegetables; my golden retriever, once an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after using this food for about seven months. my baby bulldog, who suffered from gas, now enjoys the original core version without any issues. amazon offers the best price and convenient shipping. while wellness is more expensive, its effectiveness will reduce future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy with shiny coats, a priceless benefit. additionally, wellness's simple version has helped a family member's teddy bear with severe skin issues, who has been itch-free since switching to this product.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.

prompt: Your job is to rephrase text without changing its meaning.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of four cases of this food had an unpleasant sour smell. when i contacted natural balance's customer service, they informed me that they hadn't received any complaints about that particular batch, but would pass along my feedback to their technical department. they also offered a coupon for one case. however, as a natural product with inherent variations, they suggested returning it to the retailer, which would involve paying for shipping three times. i've been feeding this variety to my three cats for a year, alternating with natural balance ultra, and they always loved it. but this batch has an off-putting smell that even my hungry cats can't tolerate. all other batches had a fresh, clean smell. i'm disappointed in the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium-priced product. as a result, i won't be buying from natural balance again and will use the coupon locally while ensuring mixed production runs.

prompt: Your job is to rephrase text without changing its meaning.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight. I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, various breeds and sizes, and i was looking for a dog food without additives that would benefit all of them. some need to lose weight, so i use wellness's best product. for my smaller dogs, i buy the small bites they love, while for my dieters, i mix healthy weight core with canned green beans or peas and carrots. my golden retriever, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for about seven months. i also use the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had gas issues, but no more since switching to wellness. amazon offers the best price with fast shipping, making it worth the extra cost. my dogs are all healthy and have shiny coats. additionally, wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies, which has helped a family member's teddy bear with severe skin issues become itch-free.

prompt: Reword this text for better readability while preserving its original sentiment.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my recent purchase of four cases of this food had an unpleasant sour odor. when i contacted natural balance's customer service, they informed me that they hadn't received complaints about that specific batch, but would pass on the information to their technical department and send a coupon for one case. however, as a natural product with expected variation, they suggested returning it to the retailer, which would involve paying for shipping three times - a costly endeavor for a heavy product like this. i've been feeding this variety to my three cats for over a year, alternating with natural balance ultra, and they have always loved it. however, i can barely stand to open the cans of this batch due to its strong smell. all previous batches had a clean, fresh aroma. i'm disappointed in natural balance's response to a quality issue from a loyal customer of their premium-priced product. as a heavy user with three cats, i won't be purchasing from them again. instead, i'll use the coupon locally and ensure that i mix production runs.

prompt: Reword this text for better readability while preserving its original sentiment.
input_text:
I bought this when i was hungry and on a whim.
there was this subscribe and save deal going on.

I like the nuts, i hate the carmel. Overall, it was too sweet for me. and now i have 6 boxes of it.
But it does work wonders when i'm hungry.
completion_text: i purchased this snack impulsively while feeling hungry and craving something on a whim, as i took advantage of a subscribe and save deal that was available at the time. i enjoy the nuts in the mix, but dislike the caramel. unfortunately, the overall product is too sweet for my taste. however, it does have its benefits - when i'm feeling hungry, it can be very effective.

prompt: Reword this text for better readability while preserving its original sentiment.
input_text:
I was expecting something more.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.
completion_text: i had anticipated something more impressive. the blueberries were disappointingly small and scarce. the clusters that are showcased in pictures of this product and other granola varieties seemed promising, but in reality, they're almost non-existent. the largest cluster i found was about the size of a dime, across all three bags. while the taste is good when you get a mix of ingredients, it's not enough to redeem the overall experience. considering the many other products available, i don't plan on repurchasing this one again.

Unless you don't have a home brew store within driving distance this is probably not the way to go.
completion_text: the product was satisfactory, but i soon realized that ordering by the pound would be more cost-effective to purchase from a local supplier, even with a slightly higher price. unless you have a homebrew store nearby, this might not be the best option.

prompt: Reword this text for better readability while preserving its original sentiment.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, each with unique breeds and sizes. in search of a brand without additives that would benefit all my dogs, i've found wellness to be the best option. for my smaller pups, i purchase the small bites, which they love due to their tiny pieces. the healthy weight core formula is used for my dieters, often mixed with canned green beans or peas and carrots. one of my golden retrievers, a rescue that weighed 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for about seven months. for my baby bulldog, who suffered from gas, the original core version has been a game-changer - no more unpleasant smells or ripples at night. amazon offers the best price for wellness and ships directly to my home, eliminating the need to lug heavy bags around. while it may be more expensive than other options, i believe its effectiveness will save me money on future vet bills in the long run. all my dogs are healthy and sport nice, shiny coats - a priceless benefit. additionally, wellness now offers a simple formula for dogs with food allergies. a family member's teddy bear, who suffered from severe skin issues, has been itch-free since switching to this version. overall, i'm impressed with wellness as a brand.

completion_text: i'm extremely satisfied with this product. the taste is exceptional, especially when paired with coffee for a swift morning meal. following the introduction of the banana walnut flavor, i discovered the chocolate chip variant and subsequently placed an order. without a doubt, the chocolate chip has become my top preference.

prompt: Reword this text for better readability while preserving its original sentiment.

I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.

prompt: Paraphrase the following text without changing its tone or meaning.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my recent purchase of four cases of this food had an unpleasant sour smell. when i contacted natural balance's customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that specific batch, but would pass along my feedback to their tech department and send me a coupon for one case. they suggested returning the product to the retailer, which would require paying for shipping three times. as this is a natural product, variation was expected, but i've always been satisfied with its clean fresh smell in previous batches. my three cats have loved this food, but they won't touch this batch unless they're extremely hungry. i'm disappointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a loyal user of their premium-priced product and will not be buying from natural balance again.

prompt: Paraphrase the following text without changing its tone or meaning.
input_text:
I bought this when i was hungry and on a whim.
there was this subscribe and save deal going on.

I like the nuts, i hate the carmel. Overall, it was too sweet for me. and now i have 6 boxes of it.
But it does work wonders when i'm hungry.
completion_text: i impulsively purchased this snack when i was famished and caught up in a subscription deal. the nuts are a hit with me, but the caramel is a miss. in general, the product was too sugary for my taste, yet i now find myself with six boxes of it. however, it does serve its purpose well when i'm craving something to eat.

prompt: Paraphrase the following text without changing its tone or meaning.
input_text:
I was expecting something more.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.
completion_text: i was expecting more from this product. the blueberries were tiny and scarce. the clusters that appeared in pictures were nowhere to be found. the largest cluster i found was only a dime-sized. the taste is good when you get a mix of everything. with so many other options available, i don't think i'll be buying this again.

completion_text: the product was satisfactory, but i soon realized that buying in bulk, like malt (which is typically ordered by the pound), would be more cost-effective from a local supplier, even if it's slightly pricier. unless you have a homebrew store within driving distance, this might not be the best option.

prompt: Paraphrase the following text without changing its tone or meaning.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, various breeds and sizes, and i was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from. my few underweight dogs need help losing weight. wellness makes the best product. i buy small bites for my smaller dogs, who love it. for my dieting dogs, i mix healthy weight core with canned green beans or peas and carrots. so far, my golden has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for seven months. i also buy original core version for my baby bulldog, who had gas issues; now there's no more smells at night! amazon has the best price for wellness, and it ships right to my home - no lugging big bags around. yes, it's more expensive, but it really works and will cut down on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy with nice shiny coats. priceless! wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies. a family member's little teddy bear had severe skin issues; she'd scratch until raw and bloody. she switched to the simple version of wellness and has been itch-free ever since. again, great brand!

prompt: Rephrase this text while maintaining its original sentiment.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of four cases of this food had an unpleasant sour smell. when i contacted natural balance customer service, they told me they hadn't received complaints about that specific batch, but would pass on the information to their tech department and send a coupon for one case. they suggested returning it to the retailer, which would involve paying for shipping three times - a significant expense for a heavy product like this. i've fed this variety to my three cats for over a year, alternating with natural balance ultra, and they've always loved it. however, they only eat this batch when extremely hungry, as the smell is unbearable. other batches had a fresh, clean scent. i'm disappointed in the customer service response to a quality issue from a loyal user of their premium-priced product - someone who has spent heavily on their brand (three cats). as a result, i won't be buying from natural balance again. instead, i'll use the coupon locally and ensure that i mix production runs.

prompt: Rephrase this text while maintaining its original sentiment.

there was this subscribe and save deal going on.

I like the nuts, i hate the carmel. Overall, it was too sweet for me. and now i have 6 boxes of it.
But it does work wonders when i'm hungry.

prompt: Rephrase this text while maintaining its original sentiment.
input_text:
I was expecting something more.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.
completion_text: i expected more from this product. the blueberries are tiny and scarce. clusters are nowhere to be found; they looked much larger in promotional pictures. even after searching through three bags, i only found a few small clusters, the largest being about the size of a dime. the taste is good when you manage to get a mix of ingredients, but overall, this product doesn't stand out from others on the market and i won't be buying it again.

completion_text: the product was good, but i soon realized that ordering something similar by the pound would be more cost-effective to purchase from a local supplier, even with a slightly higher price. unless you're close to a homebrew store, this might not be the best option.

prompt: Rephrase this text while maintaining its original sentiment.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, various breeds and sizes. i sought a brand without additives that all my dogs could benefit from. a few need to lose weight. wellness makes the best product. i buy small bites for my smaller ones - they love it. i get healthy weight core for my dieters and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots. so far, my golden, an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for about seven months. i also buy the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas. no more smells and ripples in the night! amazon has the best price for wellness, with shipping to my home - no lugging big bags back and forth. it's more expensive than other brands, but it really works and will cut down on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats. priceless! wellness now has a simple version for dogs who suffer from food allergies. a family member's little teddy bear had severe skin issues - she'd scratch until raw and bloody. she switched to the simple version of wellness and has been itch-free ever since. again, great brand!

prompt: Rephrase this text while keeping the original meaning intact.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my latest purchase of four cases had a sour, off-putting smell. when i contacted natural balance's customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, but would pass along the information to their tech department. they offered a coupon for one case, citing variation as acceptable in natural products. however, they suggested returning it to the retailer, which would involve paying for shipping three times for a heavy product like this. i've fed this variety to my three cats for a year, alternating with natural balance ultra, and they always loved it. but this batch is unpalatable, even to them when they're extremely hungry. all previous batches had a clean, fresh smell. i'm disappointed in the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium-priced product. due to this experience, i won't be buying from natural balance again and will use the coupon locally, ensuring i mix production runs.

prompt: Rephrase this text while keeping the original meaning intact.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.

prompt: Rephrase this text while keeping the original meaning intact.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, all various breeds and sizes. i was looking for a brand without additives that would benefit all my dogs. some need to lose weight. wellness makes the best product. i buy the small bites for my little ones, as the pieces are small and they love it. i also buy healthy weight core for my dieters and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots. my golden, an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for about seven months. i buy the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas. no more smells and ripples in the night! amazon has the best price for wellness, and it's shipped right to my home - no lugging big bags back and forth. while it's more expensive than other brands, it really works, and that will cut down on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats. i also recommend wellness's simple version for dogs who suffer from food allergies. a family member has a little teddy bear with severe skin issues - she'd scratch until raw and bloody. she switched to the simple version of wellness and has been itch-free ever since. again, it's a great brand!

prompt: Simplify this text ensuring the original sentiment remains unchanged.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase had a sour off-smell. natural balance customer service said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, offered a coupon for 1 case, and suggested returning it to the retailer, which would cost me triple shipping for a heavy product. i've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year, but only my cats will eat this batch when very hungry; all other batches had a clean fresh smell. i'm disappointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a loyal user of their premium priced product, and won't buy from natural balance again.

prompt: Simplify this text ensuring the original sentiment remains unchanged.
input_text:
I was expecting something more.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.

prompt: Simplify this text ensuring the original sentiment remains unchanged.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have 7 dogs, various breeds and sizes. i sought a brand without additives for all to benefit from. a few need weight loss. wellness makes the best product. i buy small bites for my little ones, who love it. healthy weight core with green beans or peas and carrots helps my dieters. my golden, an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds in 7 months. the original core version helps my baby bulldog's gas issues. no more night smells! amazon offers the best price for wellness, shipped to my home. it's more expensive, but it really works and saves on vet bills. all my dogs are healthy with shiny coats. wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies, helping my family member's teddy bear with skin issues. great brand!

prompt: Simplify this text ensuring the original sentiment remains unchanged.
input_text:

I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase had a sour off-smell. natural balance customer service said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, but offered a coupon for 1 case, citing variation as normal for natural products. they suggested returning it to the retailer, which would mean paying for shipping three times. i've fed this variety to my cats for a year and they only tolerate this batch when very hungry, unlike all other batches with a clean fresh smell. the customer service response was disappointing, especially since i'm a heavy user of their premium product.

prompt: Your job is to rephrase text without changing its meaning.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, all different breeds and sizes. i was looking for a dog food without additives that would benefit all my dogs. some need to lose weight. wellness makes the best product. i buy the small bites for my smaller dogs, who love them. for my dieters, i mix healthy weight core with canned green beans or peas and carrots. my golden, an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for about seven months. i also use the original core version for my baby bulldog, who had gas issues. no more smells and ripples at night! amazon offers the best price for wellness, with shipping to my home - no lugging big bags. yes, it's more expensive than other brands, but it really works, cutting down on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats. wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies. a family member's teddy bear, who suffered from severe skin issues, is itch-free after switching to the simple version of wellness. again, it's a great brand!

prompt: Rephrase this text while keeping the original meaning intact.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase of four cases had a sour off-smell. i contacted natural balance's customer service, who said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, would pass it along to their tech department, and send me a coupon for one case. however, as a natural product, variation was expected. they suggested i return it to the retailer, incurring three rounds of shipping for a heavy product like this, making it very expensive. i've fed this variety to my three cats for a year, alternating with natural balance ultra, and they always loved it. this batch is only tolerated when they're extremely hungry. all other batches had a clean, fresh smell. i'm disappointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium-priced product (i have three cats). i won't be buying from natural balance again. i'll use the coupon locally and ensure mixing production runs.

prompt: Reword this text for better readability while preserving its original sentiment.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, each with unique breeds and sizes. in search of an additive-free food for all my pets, i've found wellness to be the best option. some of my dogs require weight loss, so i opt for their healthy weight core formula, mixing it with canned vegetables like green beans or peas and carrots. after about seven months on this diet, my golden retriever, who was once an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds. for my baby bulldog, who suffered from gas and its accompanying smells and ripples in the night, i use wellness's original core version. the results are remarkable   no more discomfort or odor. amazon offers the best price for wellness, with convenient shipping to my doorstep, eliminating the need to lug heavy bags around. while wellness may be pricier than other brands, it's worth the investment in the long run. not only do all my dogs have healthy coats, but they've also reduced future vet bills. wellness has a simple version for pets with food allergies, and i've seen remarkable results firsthand   a family member's teddy bear, who suffered from severe skin issues, is now itch-free since switching to this formula. overall, wellness is an exceptional brand.

prompt: Rephrase this text while maintaining its original sentiment.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my recent purchase of four cases had a sour, off-putting smell. when i contacted natural balance's customer service, they said they hadn't received similar complaints about that batch, but would pass along my feedback to their technical department and send me a coupon for one case. however, as it's a natural product, they claimed variation in smell was expected. they suggested returning the product to the retailer, which would involve paying for shipping three times - a cost i found excessive for such a heavy item. i've fed this variety to my three cats for a year, alternating with natural balance ultra, and they've always loved it. but with this batch, they'll only eat it when extremely hungry. the smell is so unpleasant that i can barely open the cans. in contrast, all other batches had a clean, fresh aroma. i'm disappointed in the customer service response to a quality issue from a loyal user of their premium-priced product. as someone who owns three cats, i won't be buying from natural balance again. instead, i'll use the coupon locally and ensure i mix production runs.

prompt: Rephrase this text while maintaining its original sentiment.
input_text:
I bought this when i was hungry and on a whim.
there was this subscribe and save deal going on.

I like the nuts, i hate the carmel. Overall, it was too sweet for me. and now i have 6 boxes of it.
But it does work wonders when i'm hungry.
completion_text: i purchased this impulsively while craving something to eat, drawn in by a subscribe and save promotion. the nuts are enjoyable, but i dislike the caramel. unfortunately, the overall product is too sweet for my taste, leaving me with six boxes. however, it does prove effective at satisfying my hunger when needed.

prompt: Rephrase this text while maintaining its original sentiment.
input_text:
I was expecting something more.

Blueberries - Very small pieces, and not many of them.

Clusters - Where did they go?! When you look at the pictures of this product, and other types of their granola, it would appear that you are getting a bag of large clusters. Not the case, there are almost no clusters. The biggest cluster I found in all 3 bags was the size of a dime.

Taste - Good, when you get some of everything.

With all the other products out there, I don't think I will be purchasing this one again.
completion_text: i had higher hopes for this product. the blueberries are scattered in very small pieces and in limited quantity. the clusters that appear in pictures of this granola and their others are nowhere to be found; instead, i found almost none, with the largest cluster being about the size of a dime. while the taste is good when you manage to get some of everything mixed together, it's just not enough to make me want to repurchase this product again, given all the other options available.

prompt: Rephrase this text while maintaining its original sentiment.
input_text: Product was good but I quickly discovered ordering something like malt (which is ordered by the pound) it would be cheaper to purchase this type item from your local supplier (even if the price is a little higher). Unless you don't have a home brew store within driving distance this is probably not the way to go.
completion_text: the product was decent, but i soon realized that buying in bulk like malt (which is typically ordered by the pound) would be more cost-effective to get from your local supplier, even if the price is slightly higher. unless you don't have a home brew store within driving distance, this might not be the best approach.

prompt: Rephrase this text while maintaining its original sentiment.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have seven dogs, all different breeds and sizes. i was looking for a brand without additives that would benefit them all. some need to lose weight, so wellness makes the best product for me. i buy their small bites for my smaller dogs, which they love because the pieces are small. for my dieters, i mix the healthy weight core with canned green beans or peas and carrots. my golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds after being on this food for about seven months. i buy their original core version for my baby bulldog, who had gas issues, and no longer have smells and ripples at night! amazon has the best price for wellness, and it's shipped right to my home - no lugging big bags around. yes, it's more expensive than other brands, but it really works and will cut down on future vet bills. all my dogs are healthy with nice shiny coats, priceless! wellness now has a simple version for dogs with food allergies. a family member's teddy bear with severe skin issues had been scratching until raw and bloody, but switched to the simple version of wellness and has been itch-free ever since. again, great brand!

prompt: Simplify this text ensuring the original sentiment remains unchanged.
input_text:
My last purchase of 4 cases of this food had a sour off- smell. Called natural balance customer service, they said they hadn't received complaints about that batch, they'd pass info along to tech dept, they'd send me a coupon for 1 case.... But, it's a natural product, and variation "was to be expected". They suggested I return it to the retailer. Paying for shipping 3 times (receiving, sending back, receiving again) for a heavy product like this makes it very expensive.
I've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year (alternate with Natural Balance Ultra), and they have always loved it. They will only eat this batch if they are very very hungry. I can barely stand to open the cans. All other batches had a clean fresh smell.
I'm disapointed with the customer service response to a quality issue from a heavy user of their premium priced product. (I have 3 cats). I won't buy from Natural Balance again. I'll use the coupon locally, and make sure I'm mixing production runs.
completion_text: my last purchase had a sour off-smell. natural balance customer service said they'd pass info to tech dept, send me a coupon for 1 case, but suggested returning it to retailer at my expense. i've fed this variety to my 3 cats for a year and they only eat this batch when very hungry. all other batches had a clean fresh smell. i'm disappointed with the customer service response as a heavy user of their premium priced product.

prompt: Simplify this text ensuring the original sentiment remains unchanged.
input_text: I have 7 dogs.  All various breeds and sizes.  I was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from.  I have a few that need to lose weight.  Wellness makes the best product.  I buy the small bites for my little ones....pieces are small and they love it.  I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
completion_text: i have 7 dogs, various breeds and sizes. i was looking for a brand without additives that all my dogs would benefit from. my few overweight ones need weight loss. wellness makes the best product. i buy small bites for my little ones; they love it. i mix healthy weight core with canned veggies for my dieters. my golden has lost 19 pounds in 7 months. i also use original core for my baby bulldog, who had gas issues. no more smelly ripples at night! amazon has the best price and ships to my home. it's more expensive, but it really works and will cut vet bills. all my dogs are healthy with nice coats. wellness now has a simple version for food allergy sufferers. a family member's teddy bear has been itch-free since switching to this version. great brand!

I but the Healthy weightCORE for my "dieters" and mix it with canned green beans or peas and carrots.  So far my Golden, who was an overweight rescue at 129 pounds, has lost 19 pounds -- she's been on this food for about 7 months.  I buy the original CORE version for my baby bulldog, who had a lot of gas.  No more smells and ripples in the night!  Amazon has the best price for Wellness. And its shipped right to my home -- no lugging big bags back and forth.  Yes, it's more expensive than the other stuff--but it really works.  And that will cut down on future vet bills.  All my dogs are healthy and have nice shiny coats.  Priceless!  Wellness now has a SIMPLE version for those dogs who suffer with food allergies.  A family member has a little Teddy Bear with severe skin issues -- she'd scratch until raw and bloody.  She switched to the SIMPLE version of Wellness and has been itch free ever since.  Again...great brand!
